extendedInfo.description: The ultimate ARMA II DayZ mod guide for your mobile Android device. This application gathers all important maps, web links and utilities into a native Android application. All weapon, equipment, consumable, ammunition and vehicle information is integrated into the app for quick access. There's also a chatroom to text with your fellow players.Whether you need to check the Chernarus world map or see the stats of a weapon this is the way to go. You also have quick access to all DayZ social media including Facebook, Twitter and Reddit. DayZ wiki is also only a couple of clicks away! A must have for any serious DayZ survivor. If you are keen on sniping there's also a sniper correction table there for your :)If you encounter any incompatibility or just have some questions feel free to contact me via email. Or by submitting a comment. This app has Google analytics enabled for anonymous data collection of which sections of the app are most used. This way I can focus on bettering the features people use the most. Don't forget to rate the app ;)VERSION HISTORY:v-2.31 (15.8.12)Chat no longer autoscrolls up, has AM/PM option for timestamp and no longer stays on between restarts. Youtube links should work almost everywhere on the app. Added Estonia and Israel flag to chat and hopefully fixed the app crashes on keyboard slideout bug. Dayzgame.com website added and broken websites removed. Bear trap picture added and Satchel Charge added to equipment explosives.v-2.30 (7.8.12) NOTE: B-version: Fixed some ICS problems.Lingor Island map is now added to the app! Also, the chat can be turned off to save data & battery. It's also much less active if you're not on the chat page. Now you can get your old ID back if you lose it by getting the donate version or reinstalling / clearing app data. I have also cleaned main settings a bit.v-2.27 (1.8.12)There is now private messaging feature on the chat. The app can now be transferred to SD and is a bit smaller in size. There has been added another offline map for those who can't view the HQ one. Legend has also been added to maps.v-2.26 (30.7.12)Did a memory fix checkbox for offline HQ map that fixes out of memory problem on some devices. Also added zoom in and out buttons for the map. Added country flags to chat. DayZ DB can now be found in browser under "Wiki".v-2.25 (28.7.12)New very HQ offline map, no more online map needed (except for older android versions). Also fixed weapon damage and audibility due to nerfing. Vehicle and aircraft controls aren't mixed up anymore.v-2.20 (24.7.12)Added "Who's Online" chat feature. Also unique chatter ID's for identification. Game hotkeys can now be found under Guides->Other->Game Controls. Also you can now toggle if you want the screen to stay on at the main settings page. Also fixed half-screen-white problem with some devices.v-2.10 (22.7.12)Added chat feature. Chat with your fellow players while you play. Great for discussing the game in general too.v-2.06 (19.7.12):Added bicycle info, height map, 3D map and changed list styles to suit app.v-2.05 (18.7.12):Added urls to website links & by-tags to maps. Database text size is now changeable. Integrated how to find north. Some minor bug fixes with a lot faster startup and offline maps should load quicker now :)v-2.0 (16.7.12):It is here. The completely redesigned leading DayZ Mobile app for Android. A lot of new maps, even better database and a plethora of interesting DayZ links right on your mobile device.

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Has everything you need, very well made, simple to navigate and work, no problems so far, plus, if the dayz standaline comes out for xbox or whatever, then an update would be need because of all the new features that are going to be implemented into the game
reviews.author: Peter Walker

reviews.title: Great and useful guide!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this guide the whole time I\'ve been playing DayZ and it has proved quite useful. My one request is that the maps were in a higher resolution so that they were clearer when zoomed in
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect app for dayz!
reviews.comment: Awesome resource, works great! Makes zombie killing a breeze!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Informative
reviews.comment: This app is good for helping players get more acquainted with the Day z game and the live chat is helpful for new players to get hints or tips from the veterans.
reviews.author: Jacob Arnes

reviews.title: 5 stars
reviews.comment: Best dayz app and chat is totally active and modded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Diehard DayZ
reviews.comment: I\'d like to maybe see more key locations like military camps. You\'re app is very helpful, and I found the \"how to find North\" guide both informative and entertaining!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very helpful
reviews.comment: Now all I need is to figure out how to use my mic. Thanks for eliminating all the rest of my questions. Amazingly simplistic as well. Very intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice tool
reviews.comment: I use this on a tablet and it is really easy to keep track on myself on the map.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The people in chat are friendly and helpful and the app tells you heaps of stuff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great insight all around.
reviews.comment: Its nice having a list of loot spots and other useful information in a matter of seconds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Apps cool
reviews.comment: Haven\'t played the game yet but the app is very informative
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sweet
reviews.comment: About to start playing the dayz  mod. So this app is priceless. I can check out the latest news on the standalone project. I can also chat with other dayz fans in the app. Love this app!
reviews.author: Matthew Peavy

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: At  first I saw almost no value to this, having a web  browser in steam  and all. But the sniper correction tables automatically make it a 5 star app for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why didn\'t I see this before!?
reviews.comment: A must have for anyone starting out with DayZ. Excellent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Required for any serious player
reviews.comment: Single handedly the one companion app any player for dayz needs. The chat functionality gave me a way to ask questions and get answers which made it easier to update and connect to servers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: Straightforward app that makes everything easy to look up. Weapons guide is super handy, tells what damage each weapon does and more. Great stuff!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Amzing app so easyer to find stuff
reviews.author: kris ng

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Everything you need while playing dayz, great work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: Good information...i like this app ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jake
reviews.comment: Can only scroll up and down on the official stand alone link. One big map like from the app \"day z map\" would be good to remove the cluster of all the other maps and removing the loading time for the online maps with such installation would be great! The developer is hard working and interacts with the community. He fixes the app as fast as he can, thank you for your work Wortex. Can\'t complain anymore, everything has been fixed 10/10 app
reviews.author: A Google User
